name: Archaic: Wrath of Ratatoskr
description:
An epic survival game set in a steampunk world. Inspired by bullet-hell games like Vampire Survivor, fight hordes of enemies with the playstyle of your choice. Use a mix of steampunk, medieval and magical weapons to become the ultimate killing machine :)

Story:

Set in the city of Cenaria, three guilds are competing for glory. The Steamers Guild are leading the way with technological advancements. The Knight Templars are trying to stay relevant in the new age of steam technology, while the Mages Circle are seeking ancient knowledge that has been long forgotten.

While the steam technology is bringing in many new faces to the city, there have also been reports of lost supplies and people mysteriously going missing.  Rumours of a certain Ratatoskr are circulating the city.

Development

We are two developers working on this project.

Our goal is to provide continous updates to the game. Any feedback in the comments is welcome!

Roadmap
-New unlockable characters
-Unique character abilities
-New weapons
-Talent tree
-New maps
-New game modes
-New enemies
And much more!
